name: llm-zoomcamp (DataTalksClub)
description: [项目级] LLM Zoomcamp - a free online course about real-life applications of LLMs. In 10 weeks you will learn how to build an AI system that answers questions about your knowledge base.。来源: https://github.com/DataTalksClub/llm-zoomcamp

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
- Basics of LLMs and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
- OpenAI API and text search with Elasticsearch

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:

03-evaluation/search_evaluation
04-monitoring
